title: Collared with Ink
description: [Siren Classic Erotic Alternative Paranormal Consensual BDSM Romance, M/M, werewolves, spanking, whipping, sounding, sex toys, HEA] To celebrate the addition of a new member of their group, Grayson Gambler and his friends head out into the city for some new ink. Little does Gray know that the enigmatic shop owner, Mustang Richards, has more on his mind than the ink he’s putting on Gray’s skin, and it will soon turn into a night Gray will never forget. Mustang is a wolf shifter who is responsible for the largest pack west of the Mississippi. Getting involved with humans is strictly forbidden, but the submissive who walks into his shop proves almost irresistible to his Dominant side. Giving in to temptation proves all too easy, but when he accidently turns Grayson into a werewolf, there will be consequences neither one of them planned on dealing with. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Jana Downs
